text: William Avery "Billy" Bishop (8 February 1894 â€“ 11 September 1956) V.C. was a Canadian flying ace from World War I. He won 72 fights, making him the top Canadian flying ace.In 1919 Bishop was photographed with Canadian Ace William George Barker V.C.Aerodrome Forum Photograph ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Aviators Category:Military people from Ontario Category:People from Owen Sound
